creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council
markings: lion, anchor, Gothic letter [G], company date letter [P] (1883). pattern number 1580 and sterling stamp; also script initials: [FAB] and Bailey, Banks and Biddle for Philadelphia store who sold the set
object_name: Coffee pot, from an eight-piece tea and coffee service
title: Coffee pot, from an eight-piece tea and coffee service
